labs.name: Git and Version Control
labs.desc: This lab teaches how to plan, structure, and design a project so that later development is simplified.

labs.name: Calculator, Part 1
labs.desc: In this lab, we will build a simple calculator application in JavaScript. The goal is to familiarize students with programming JavaScript.

labs.name: Calculator, Part 2
labs.desc: We extend the work from Part 1 and supplement the calculator with a user interface, which requires JavaScript in order to function.
